```{r, include = FALSE}
)
```

```{r setup}
library(Ensembles)
Ensembles::classification(data = ISLR::Carseats,
                          colnum = 7,
                          numresamples = 2,
                          do_you_have_new_data = "N",
                          how_to_handle_strings = 0,
                          save_all_trained_models = "N",
                          use_parallel = "Y",
                          train_amount = 0.60,
                          test_amount = 0.20,
                          validation_amount = 0.20)

warnings() # to confirm this runs without any warnings or errors
```
